title: Knickerbocker Recipe
full_text:
Knickerbocker Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
amber rum
1
teaspoon
curacao
2
teaspoons
raspberry syrup
Juice
of
1/2
a
lime
Directions
Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice; shake well and pour, unstrained, into a chilled old fashioned glass. Garnish with raspberries, blackberries, or most any kind of fresh fruit you have on hand.
